title: An investigation of slaughter weight and muscle type effects on carcass fatty acid profiles and meat textural characteristics of young Holstein Friesian bulls
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Veysel Fatih Ozdemir, Ridvan Kocyigit, Mete Yanar, Recep Aydin, Abdulkerim Diler, Valiollah Palangi, Maximilian Lackner
